pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Hydrate Shampoo 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH HYDRATE SHAMPOO formulated with Olive Squalane & Hemp Seed Oil provides intense hydration for dry & dehydrated hair for smoothness and strength. 0% Artificial Colourants & Silicones

The BIO-TECH HYDRATE range with OLIVE SQUALANE, HEMP SEED OIL & HYALURONIC ACID treats the needs of dry and dehydrated hair, providing nourished and repaired hair full of moisture. BIO-TECH by Extra Care formulas with LIQUID KERATIN help repair existing damage and fortify the cell structure for future damage prevention.

WITH:
+ OLIVE SQUALANE
+ HEMP SEED OIL
+ HYALURONIC ACID
+ LIQUID KERATIN
+ APRICOT KERNEL OIL

NO:
- ARTIFICIAL COLOURANTS
- SILICONES
- SLS
- EDTA

Made In Australia

100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

Size: 500mL

Hair Type: Dry, Dehydrated Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Intensively Hydrates, Moisturises & Smoothes Hair
• WITH:
+ OLIVE SQUALANE
+ HEMP SEED OIL
+ HYALURONIC ACID
+ LIQUID KERATIN
+ APRICOT KERNEL OIL
• NO:
- ARTIFICIAL COLOURANTS
- SILICONES
- SLS
- EDTA
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Free from Artificial Colourants, Silicones, SLS, EDTA

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polyquaternium-10, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, PPG-3 Caprylyl Ether, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Squalane, Sodium Hydroxide, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Limonene, Hexyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Urea

Directions

Massage gently into wet hair. Rinse thouroughly and repeat if necessary.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable, Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
